amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for the Energy Information Administration by $500,000 and increases funding for the Office of Economic Impact and Diversity by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for the Energy Information Administration by $500,000 and increase funds for Salaries and Expenses for the Department of Energy by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kaptur amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kaptur amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A027) offered by Ms. Kaptur.
